game.name: Turquoise
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build your reef, observe wildlife, and learn about marine fauna. Turquoise is a contemplative game where you create and decorate a protected marine area to welcome a wide variety of aquatic species. Your screen becomes a window into a vibrant underwater world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your reef, observe wildlife, and learn about marine fauna. Turquoise is a contemplative game where you create and decorate a protected marine area to welcome a wide variety of aquatic species. Your screen becomes a window into a vibrant underwater world.
